offerings.name: License your software (licensor)
offerings.description: Protect and exploit your intellectual property (IP)

outcomes.title: You would like assistance settling on licensing business model
outcomes.description: We will help you determine the best licensing approach for your software including revenue models and legal structures

components.name: Strategy Paper on Business Models
components.description: We will walk you through various alternative business models for commercial exploitation of software, including self-hosting, hosted and SaaS models

components.name: Revenue Model Assessment
components.description: Detailed assessment of potential revenue models and their legal implications

outcomes.title: You need assistance with licensing agreement drafting
outcomes.description: We will help you draft comprehensive licensing agreements that protect your interests

components.name: Draft Licensing Agreement
components.description: Prepare a comprehensive licensing agreement tailored to your specific needs
